scripts.start: concurrently "cd charting-app; npm start" "cd graph-app; npm start" "cd rich-text-app; npm start" "cd map-app; npm start" "cd search-bar-mfe; npm start" "cd data-grid-mfe; npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd charting-app; npm install" "cd graph-app; npm install" "cd rich-text-app; npm install" "cd search-bar-mfe; npm install" "cd map-app; npm install" "cd data-grid-mfe; npm install"
